description: Read-only ops console backed by Postgres. Use the admin proxy for JSON drilldown (/api/admin/**, /metrics).

panels.description: Postgres: recent jobs that are not indexed (likely needing operator attention).

targets.rawSql: SELECT j.id, COALESCE(s.code, '') AS source_code, j.name, j.status, j.retry_count, j.created_at, j.started_at, j.finished_at, j.pages_crawled, j.pages_failed, j.warc_file_count, j.warc_bytes_total FROM public.archive_jobs j LEFT JOIN public.sources s ON s.id = j.source_id WHERE j.created_at >= (now() - INTERVAL '14 days') ORDER BY j.created_at DESC LIMIT 200;

panels.title: Recent Jobs (last 14 days)

panels.description: Postgres: redacted issue report metadata only (no email or free text).

targets.rawSql: SELECT id, category, status, created_at, updated_at, snapshot_id, original_url, page_url FROM public.grafana_issue_reports_summary WHERE created_at >= (now() - INTERVAL '30 days') ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 200;

panels.title: Issue Reports (last 30 days; metadata only)

title: HealthArchive - Ops Console (Read-only)
